snippet.title: M.O.Z.I. - Announcement Gameplay Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Please, add M.O.Z.I. to Steam wishlist: this will help us a lot!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2659040/MOZI

M.O.Z.I. - A post-apocalyptic FPS with elements of horror and tower defense.

Step into the desolate world of M.O.Z.I., an intense single-player first-person shooter laced with the strategic complexity of Tower Defense and the chilling atmosphere of a Horror game. Embark on a perilous journey to escort a vital transport to one of humanity's last bastions, traversing war-ravaged lands teeming with danger. Explore abandoned settlements, both alien and human, in ruins. The wilderness is unforgiving - you'll need to scavenge for food and batteries while fending off monsters, mutants, feral humans, and the wild creatures that now claim this planet as their own. As you navigate through treacherous paths and bond with your companion, unravel the mysteries of your past and shape a future in this unforgiving world.
